channel.title: Beam Games on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Beam Games on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Australian Rules Nintendo
item.description: [big]Recently I found myself hanging out in a retro video game store, looking at the cheapo bin at the various titles for the NES and other systems. If you’ve done something similar in the recent past, you’ll know that the cheapo bin will inevitably be filled with lots of sports games. It doesn’t matter if the sports games are well-regarded or even iconic—for whatever reason gamers just don’t want to buy them.
